CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 7, 1962, pg. 1, reads: "Composer Bell With Family - Holding his 16-month son. 'Poochie,' Charles Bell, Pittsburgh Composer and foremost exponent of 'third stream' music, relaxes with his greatest supporters, his wife, Alice, and ten-year-old Linda.  They reside at 923 Adelaide St. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Jazz pianist Charles Bell, Alice Bell (Pittrell), their son Charles "Poochie" Bell Jr., and daughter dancer Linda Imani Starkey - Barrett, posed in their home, 923 Adelaide Street
